channel.title: Version 6.3 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 6.3.0 (2024-09-03) Enhancements [feature] theme: support Obsidian styled alerts #903 [feature] notice: add expander to box title #901 Fixes [bug] children: fix sort parameter #898 [bug] mermaid: classDiagram breaks when using «interface» #895 [bug] toc: don’t show toc button if empty #893 Maintenance [task] mermaid: update to 11.1.0 #904 [task][change] expand: rename open parameter to expanded #902 [task] i18n: update Arabic translation #900
